text.__SUMMARY__: Galium elongatum (marsh bedstraw or tall bedstraw) is a species of plants in the  Rubiaceae. It is widespread across most of Europe, North Africa and the Middle East from Turkey to Palestine to Iran.Galium elongatum is a tall, erect herb with panicles of small white flowers.
